name: Dungeon Explorer Prototype
description:
A game prototype developed in a week for a university project, made using Unity and the Playgrounds package with some alterations and custom scripts.

The art assets used in this game were made by Pixel_Poem and 0x72, they are available for free in here:

  • 2D Pixel Dungeon Asset Pack
  • 16x16 Dungeon Tileset II

How To Play

ACTIONKEYSMovementW,A,S,DLook DirectionMouse CursorDashSpacePickup WeaponEAttackLeft Mouse Button


Gameplay

Pass through 5 dungeon levels, collect keys to open doors, dash over holes, dodge traps and fight enemies.

Cheats

Some commands in case you get stuck:

  • R: Reset the level.
  • F1 - F5: Go to level 1 through 5.

Feel free to leave comments/critiques below!
